inclusion.criterion: Relatives of patients with potentially monogenic newly diagnosed type 2 diabetes
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: anti-GAD antibodies, malignancies, and any condition severely impairing liver and/or kidney function.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: All subjects consume a weight-maintaining diet containing 200-250 g of carbohydrate/day for at least three days before studies.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, which is a genetic disorder that affects copper metabolism. The patient's laboratory study shows low serum caeruloplasmin and raised 24 hour urine copper excretion.
